TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TenantSupportTicketResource extends Azure.ResourceManager.ArmResource

Docs.summary: A Class representing a TenantSupportTicket along with the instance operations that can be performed on it. If you have a you can construct a from an instance of using the GetTenantSupportTicketResource method. Otherwise you can get one from its parent resource using the GetTenantSupportTicket method.

Docs.summary:
Check the availability of a resource name. This API should be used to check the uniqueness of the name for adding a new communication to the support ticket.
Request Path/providers/Microsoft.Support/supportTickets/{supportTicketName}/checkNameAvailability
Operation IdCommunicationsNoSubscription_CheckNameAvailability
